data.text: Amazing experience. Would stay there again and it is our musty place for our nextt visit. We were a family of five with a youngest being three years old. It was a perfect setting so accommodating  this cute boutique hotel. It’s too good to be true. the best customer service
data.title: Must stay here

data.text:
The room was great and well-appointed. The location and access to mass transit made for very convenient movement around the city. The staff was exceptional; welcoming, accommodating, and professional. 
We will stay there again and recommend it highly.
data.title: A Perfect Stay in Barcelona

data.text: The location of this hotel is perfect! The friendly staff take exceptional care to attend to all your needs and are happy to answer questions and point you in the right direction. The comfort of the room personalized to your needs and very clean. The daily breakfast ( buffet and hot dishes which could be ordered off the menu) was delicious and served in a lovely space overlooking the avenue and we occasionally relaxed there to read or enjoy a small sweet, tea or water set out for the guests in the afternoon. We could not recommend Hotel 62 more highly. We will be back!
data.title: Exceptional Hotel in a great location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 
Thank you indeed for taking the time to relay your detailed and honest feedback of your recent stay with us. 
Your feedback is very helpful to others thinking of staying with us. Wonderful to know that you loved our location, facilities & services and the friendly hosts. 
We look forward to welcoming you back again at the hotel on your next visit to Barcelona.
Best regards,
owner_response.author: Sara Belver

data.text: The room is very comfortable, room size is big, with a balcony (junior suite), the bed is comfortable. The room and toilet are very clean. Breakfast is good with ala carte choices and semi buffet. There are only two challenges: 1. The internet is slow. To the extent that I have to switch to my data for uploading to Instagram. 2. The housekeeper kept throwing away the two toothbrushes and replace by only 1. Our comb was thrown away too with no replacement. Other than that the stay was excellent.
data.title: Great hotel, good location and value for money

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,
We would like to express our sincere appreciation for you coming to stay with us and for taking the time to share your great feedback.
We love showcasting the very best of Barcelona through our sevice, hotel design and location and we're delighted to hear that you enjoyed it. 
We all hope that you will be able to come back and stay with us in the near future. 
Best regards,
owner_response.author: Sara Belver

data.text:
I had a wonderful stay at this hotel and would highly recommend it to others. The service provided by the staff was outstanding, as they were always friendly, attentive, and ready to assist with any request. The breakfast options were impressive and delicious, offering a wide range of choices to suit every palate.

The cleanliness of the hotel left nothing to be desired, as my room and the common areas were immaculate throughout my stay. It was evident that the staff took great pride in maintaining the cleanliness standards, which greatly contributed to my overall satisfaction.

The hotel had a great vibe with a cozy and welcoming atmosphere. The decor was tasteful and created a sense of calm and relaxation. Whether I was in my room or in the public spaces, I always felt comfortable and at ease.

Lastly, the location of the hotel couldn't get any better. It was conveniently situated near several attractions, restaurants, and shops, making it easy to explore the area on foot. I was able to fully enjoy my time at the hotel and take advantage of everything the surrounding area had to offer.

Overall, my experience at this hotel was exceptional. From the positive service to the great breakfast, cleanliness, good vibe, and amazing location, I couldn't have asked for more. I would definitely choose to stay here again in the future.
data.title: Great place to stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 
First of all, thank you very much for your positive review, as well as for your words about our hotel and the treatment received from our staff.
We are glad you enjoyed our clean facilities and that we could collaborate in making your stay an incredible experience..
We look forward to your return to the Hotel SixtyTwo.
Best regards,
owner_response.author: Sara Belver
